Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near Broadway/Cornelia
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses temp. rerouted both directions due to street blockage near  Broadway/Cornelia.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses temp. rerouted both directions due to street blockage near  Broadway/Cornelia.

Southbound buses will operate via Addison, Lake Shore, Belmont, and resume normal route..

Northbound buses will operate via Broadway, Belmont, Lake Shore, Addison, Broadway, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #97 Skokie Temporary Reroute at Skokie/Church
ShortDescription: 97 Skokie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#97 Skokie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Skokie, Gross Point, Bronx, Dempster, and resume normal route due to street blockage near Skokie/Church.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Belmont
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Belmont due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Belmont due to a sick customer with an emergency single track Forest Park-bound between Belmont to Addison.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area. Shuttle buses are available between Harlem and Belmont to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
